channel.title: Npc text + tele + starter =1?
channel.description:
Ok in the process of making my new idea of a server i need to know how to do this:
You spawn in XX location (Not decided yet)
You talk to NPC
He explains :
You're in the barren zone out here - you click click here to continue We need to get you out of here, - again, click here to continue And get you into a race, and fast! - again click here to continue You must choose either X or X - again^
Then each race comes up as an option :
XXXXXXX or AAAAAAA
You click XXXXXXX and it tele's you to a certain coords you click AAAAAAA and it tele's you to a certain coords
Thats 1 bit^, ill elaborate if needed, other part after this code i need
Starter added - i can do that additem etc,
But then how do i make it so its starter = 1 so you can't just go back and get another starter?
If you can help with any of the above then thanks, ill give you my msn if you need it- Rep++ for help + credits, thanks again

item.title: Npc text + tele + starter =1?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

Ok in the process of making my new idea of a server i need to know how to do this:

You spawn in XX location (Not decided yet)

You talk to NPC

He explains :

You’re in the barren zone out here - you click click here to continue
We need to get you out of here, - again, click here to continue
And get you into a race, and fast! - again click here to continue
You must choose either X or X - again^

Then each race comes up as an option :

XXXXXXX
or
AAAAAAA

You click XXXXXXX and it tele’s you to a certain coords
you click AAAAAAA and it tele’s you to a certain coords

Thats 1 bit^, ill elaborate if needed, other part after this code i need

Starter added - i can do that additem etc,

But then how do i make it so its starter = 1 so you can’t just go back and get another starter?

If you can help with any of the above then thanks, ill give you my msn if you need it- Rep++ for help + credits, thanks again
